testcase.name: when no build type is provided then it should crash
when firebase token is not provided then it should crash
when no buildType is provided then it should crash
when its executed without tests then it should return a tasks containing build generation and publisher
when wrong build type is provided then it should crash

testcase.name: when firebase project id is not provided then it should crash
when its executed with test then it should return a tasks containing tests, build generation and publisher
